title: Taylor Swift embraces fall in an orange dress at Madonna's final Madame X concert in New York
text:
She serenaded a small group of fans at NPR's Tiny Desk show last week.

And the tables turned for Taylor Swift on Saturday night as she was spotted attending the final night of Madonna's Madame X 16-show concert in New York City.

The 29-year-old showcased her stellar fall style in a casual and comfortable mini dress and boots.

Supportive friend: Taylor Swift showcased her support for Madonna on Saturday night when she was spotted attending her show in New York City

Taylor's oversized ensemble featured long sleeves which she tucked above her elbows, with the dress billowing down to her mid-thighs.

The 5ft10 beauty added to her tall stature with a pair of black chunky heeled boots for the evening.

The Lover singer accessorised with a black cross-body bag and styled her blonde hair back into a loose low bun.

Leggy display: Taylor's oversized ensemble featured long sleeves and reached to her mid-thighs

Winner: 2015 also saw Madonna present the singer with the iHeartRadio Song Of The Year award for Shake It Off

Taylor's glam was kept dewy with blushed cheeks, highlighted cheekbones and her signature red lip.

Madonna, 61, has previously gushed over how much she loves the Cats actress over the years.

'I like Taylor Swift. I think she writes some really catchy pop sons. I can't get them out of my head,' she told the Australian Today Show in 2015.

Together? Madonna, 61, was spotted leaving the Brooklyn Academy of Music venue with her new backup dancer 'boyfriend', Ahlamalik Williams, 25

16 down! Madonna played 16 shows out of the 91 for her tour in New York, completing the run on Saturday night

Taylor responded on Tumblr at the time: 'Thanks now I'm dead #HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO DEAL WITH THIS #BE COOL TAYLOR STOP BEING EMBARRASSING).'

2015 also saw Madonna present the singer with the iHeartRadio Song Of The Year award for Shake It Off.

And besides Taylor's appearance at the show, it was a big night for Madonna, 61, spotted leaving the Brooklyn Academy of Music venue with her new backup dancer 'boyfriend', Ahlamalik Williams, 25.

Casual: The Like A Prayer singer rocked an oversized Clockwork Orange hoodie and fedora hat as she walked out holding hands with the choreographer

Big night: Madonna appeared in high spirits and stunned in a bold red lip following the show

The Like A Prayer singer rocked an oversized Clockwork Orange hoodie and fedora hat as she walked out holding hands with the choreographer.

Her youngest daughter was also with her.

Clearly very close, Madonna tickled fans back in June when she shared a video on Instagram in which she shared a video while twerking on Ahlamalik.

Madonna's Madame X Tour will see her play 91 shows all across the world, finishing in Paris, France in March 2020.
description: Taylor Swift showcased her support for Madonna on Saturday night when she was spotted attending her show in New York City.
